content.raw:
I made a few minor comments in the code. My major suggestion would be to create a virtual `OnCollision()` function, similar to `OnReady()`, `OnRunning()` and `OnFinished()` and we call it every time that we consider a collision. We can offer an empty implementation in `scoring_plugin.cc` . This way, other derived plugins can optionally override the `OnCollision()` function, and detect the exact time where the collision happens \(and change score or react accordingly\).

Ready to approve after these suggestions.
